title: Strengthening Instructional Practical Skills: Project-Based Learning Design for Hybrid Engineering Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental engineering concepts and project management experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously utilize over 80% of video content in a hybrid lecture format to complete project assignments.
Learners categorize video learning materials by difficulty level and review them at least twice during exam periods.
Learners integrate online video materials and offline practice in a 5:5 ratio when performing team projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
